text:
Kindle Kids International School (KKIS): Located near Toa Payoh and central location. KKIS offers a self-developed curriculum for primary and secondary students. Emphasizing experiential learning, the school maintains small class sizes. Annual fees is lesser than other international schools, making it one of Singapore's more affordable international schools. Teachers are passionate and caring.
Best International school for children.

Hi all , my child have been in kkis for 4 in a half year now and it's been so great so far the teachers are nice and kind they help my child when she has a confusion and this and last year her class teacher was himani mam who made her comfortable with the class and I hope for next year grade 6 she's her class teacher again thanks.

I am very grateful to Kindle Kids school as they accepted to take most attention and individual care to my son who has Developmental delay and so a slow learner.
The Principal, the co ordinator and the team of teachers encouraged my son by giving him confidence and motivation to participate in all activities and also designed a reduced syllabus and a separate question paper just for him until he gains self confidence.  Also the revision papers given in each subject, 2 weeks before the exams help all the kids to prepare well and face the exams confidently.  Moreover the students in this school well behave with good moral support for each others. My son felt a safe and friendly environment in the school. As a mother I am very satisfied with this team .

Hi all , just my kids last term exams ended , my kids one year journey in KKIS was really awesome . Teachers have put there sincere efforts to bring out the best in each kid in any area including extra curricular, sports and academics. The best part is following the curriculum with a perfect bland boosting up confidence in each kid . I would like to Thank each and every teacher to put the continuous care , support , collaboration and most importantly patience . Hoping to be the same in future . My Special Thanks to Mrs Naufila firdouse Grade 2 class teacher and Mrs Rupali Baweja Grade 1 class teacher and all the subject teachers who have put hard work to  bring up there students.

I highly recommend KKIS! The staff and faculty are welcoming, caring, and dedicated to ensuring each student's success. The challenging yet engaging curriculum, along with a variety of extracurricular activities, provides a well-rounded education for students. My child thoroughly enjoyed attending this school and we are grateful for the wonderful learning environment it provided.
